DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate safety efficacy remove unwanted scar use 755nm Alexandrite laser .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Is healthy male female 18 85 year old . 2 . Has unwanted scar ( include atrophic , hypertrophic , hyper hypo pigment , erythematous ) wish undergo laser treatment remove improve . 3 . Is willing consent participate study . 4 . Is willing comply requirement study include photograph , follow post treatment care attend treatment follow visit 1 . Is hypersensitive light exposure . 2 . Has active localize systemic infection . 3 . Is take medication ( ) sunlight contraindication . 4 . Has history squamous cell carcinoma melanoma . 5 . Has history keloid scarring . 6 . Has use oral isotretinoin ( AccutaneÂ® ) within 12 month initial treatment plan use course study . Note : Skin must regain normal degree moisture prior treatment . 7 . Has history immunosuppression/immune deficiency disorder ( include HIV infection AIDS ) use immunosuppressive medication . 8 . Is female pregnant , pregnant within last 3 month , currently breast feed plan pregnancy study period . 9 . Is allergic lidocaine , tetracaine Xylocaine epinephrine . 10 . Has reason determine physician ineligible participate study .
